text: 1:4-5 Jon 1:12; 15:16; 17:24; Rom 8:28-30; 2 Korin 6:18; Galesia 4:5; Efesus 5:27; Kolosi 1:22; 2 Tesalonika 2:13; 2 Timoti 1:9; Jems 2:5; 1 Pita 1:2Dughiar God tɨghar nguazir kamɨn ingaramim, a kamaghɨn ifonge, e a baghvɨra itir gumazamizibar ikɨva, an damazimɨn arazir kuratam ikian kogham, egha a fomɨra e ginaba. Egha ghaze, e Krais ko poroghɨv ikɨ, egh tuavir kamɨn e an gumazamizibar mɨn otogham. A fomɨra bar e gifongegha e ginabagha ghaze, a Krais Iesusɨn ingangarimɨn tuavimɨn e damightɨ, e an boribar otivigham. God uan bar akongezir arazim ko uan ifongiamɨn gɨn ghua bizir kam gami.
